name: Panatura Hell
description: Panatura hell is a ready-to-use natural wheat pre-dough that revives the traditional art of baking. It is made with the best raw materials and naturally fermented over several days using a globally patented process. The result is bread and baked goods of the highest quality produced efficiently and without baking agents. Panatura light can be used with all working methods, via systems (direct or long dough flow) and via cold or deep-freeze storage.
